data.lyric:
[ti:Heart On Ice]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heart On Ice - Rod Wave
[00:03.99]Speaker Bangers Bangers Bangers Bangers
[00:22.52]Look uh look
[00:24.63]Heart been broke so many times ah ah
[00:27.21]I don't know what to believe
[00:30.70]Mama say it's my fault it's my fault
[00:33.11]I wear my heart on my sleeve
[00:36.36]Think it's best I put my heart on ice
[00:38.39]Heart on ice 'cause I can't breathe
[00:42.79]I'ma put my heart on ice heart on
[00:45.01]Ice it's gettin' the best of me
[00:48.09]While in the cell with Lil' Hakeem after
[00:49.92]I slapped him I had told him
[00:51.56]I don't know how you get down with
[00:53.12]Them clowns but I'm a soldier
[00:54.52]No one could understand
[00:56.14]I had way too much aggression
[00:57.56]That built over the years from my abandoned adolescence
[01:00.69]See I done been lied to backstabbed and heartbroken
[01:03.51]I wanted to cry but I was too afraid to open
[01:06.64]Prayin' one day I'd find a peace of mind by the ocean
[01:09.84]I spent all my time committing crimes to get closer
[01:12.76]While at my nana house I play
[01:14.60]The couch starin' at the ceiling
[01:16.64]Tryin' not to get in my feelings
[01:19.07]Thinkin' of a way I could make these millions
[01:21.88]Maybe that'll take this pain away and
[01:23.73]Clear up all these rainy days yeah
[01:25.50]Heart been broke so many times ah ah
[01:28.00]I don't know what to believe what to believe
[01:31.41]Mama say it's my fault it's my fault
[01:33.84]I wear my heart on my sleeve may fault
[01:37.23]Think it's best I put my heart on ice
[01:39.26]Heart on ice 'cause I can't breathe
[01:41.63]I can't breathe I can't breathe
[01:43.53]I'ma put my heart on ice heart on
[01:45.38]Ice it's gettin' the best of me best of me
[01:52.22]Yeah yeah
[01:56.08]Yeah yeah
[02:03.42]Yeah yeah yeah
[02:09.61]Yeah yeah
[02:11.53]Brrt
data.trans:
[ti:Heart On Ice]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.95]SpeakerBangerz制作
[00:22.19]快看呀
[00:24.51]心碎了太多次 我不知道该相信什么了
[00:30.40]妈妈说都是我的错 是我自找的 我这人太实诚了
[00:36.13]看来我最好变得冷漠如冰
[00:38.23]我的心寒冷如冰 我难以呼吸
[00:42.65]我要让我的心冷漠如冰 我真的快要崩溃了
[00:48.00]和Lil' Hakeem在牢里的时候 我打了他 然后告诉他
[00:51.35]我不知道你怎么跟那些小丑扯上关系的 但我是个战士
[00:54.40]没人能明白 我的侵略性太强了
[00:57.42]这都是因为我年少时候被人抛弃 缺乏关爱
[01:00.41]我被人骗过 被人背叛过 被人伤心过
[01:03.50]我想哭 但我不敢袒露心扉
[01:06.50]祈祷有一天我能在海边找到内心的宁静
[01:09.58]我把时间都用来做不法之事 只想尽快到达那一天
[01:12.78]在我奶奶的家里 我睡在沙发上 凝望着天花板
[01:16.47]不想让自己太忧愁
[01:18.81]希望有个办法能挣到几百万
[01:21.77]也许这样就能不再痛苦 阴雨天也会就此放晴
[01:25.54]心碎了太多次 我不知道该相信什么了
[01:31.23]妈妈说都是我的错 是我自找的 我这人太实诚了
[01:36.90]看来我最好变得冷漠如冰
[01:39.01]我的心寒冷如冰 我难以呼吸
[01:43.48]我要让我的心冷漠如冰 我真的快要崩溃了
[01:51.72]//
[01:55.71]//
[02:02.96]//
[02:09.25]//
[02:10.97]//
